verses.verse: In those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> when there was a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> and they had <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to eat, <S%G2068><s%> He called <S%G4341><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them,

" I feel <S%G4697><s%> compassion <S%G4697><s%> for the multitude <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they have remained <S%G4357><s%> with Me now <S%G2235><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to eat; <S%G2068><s%>

and if <S%G1437><s%> I send <S%G630><s%> them away <S%G630><s%> hungry <S%G3523><s%> to their home, <S%G3624><s%> they will faint <S%G1590><s%> on the way; <S%G3598><s%> and some <S%G5100><s%> of them have <S%G1510><s%> come <S%G1510><s%> from a distance. <S%G3113><s%> "

And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "Where <S%G4159><s%> will anyone <S%G5100><s%> be able <S%G1410><s%> to [find enough to] satisfy <S%G5526><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G3778><s%> with bread <S%G740><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in a desolate <S%G2047><s%> place <S%G2047><s%>?"
And He was asking <S%G2065><s%> them, "How <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> do you have <S%G2192><s%>?" And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Seven. <S%G2033><s%>"

And He directed <S%G3853><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> on the ground; <S%G1093><s%> and taking <S%G2983><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> He gave <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> and broke <S%G2806><s%> them, and started giving <S%G1325><s%> them to His disciples <S%G3101><s%> to serve <S%G3908><s%> to them, and they served <S%G3908><s%> them to the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

They also <S%G2532><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> small <S%G2485><s%> fish; <S%G2485><s%> and after He had blessed <S%G2127><s%> them, He ordered <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> to be served <S%G3908><s%> as well. <S%G2532><s%>

And they ate <S%G2068><s%> and were satisfied; <S%G5526><s%> and they picked <S%G142><s%> up seven <S%G2033><s%> large <S%G4711><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full <S%G4051><s%> of what <S%G4051><s%> was left <S%G4051><s%> over <S%G4051><s%> of the broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces. <S%G2801><s%>
And about <S%G5613><s%> four <S%G5070><s%> thousand <S%G5070><s%> were [there;] and He sent <S%G630><s%> them away. <S%G630><s%>
And immediately <S%G2117><s%> He entered <S%G1684><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> with His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to the district <S%G3313><s%> of Dalmanutha. <S%G1148><s%>

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out and began <S%G757><s%> to argue <S%G4802><s%> with Him, seeking <S%G2212><s%> from Him a sign <S%G4592><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> to test <S%G3985><s%> Him.

And sighing <S%G389><s%> deeply <S%G389><s%> in His spirit, <S%G4151><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> does this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> for a sign <S%G4592><s%>? Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, no <S%G1487><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> shall be given <S%G1325><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>"
And leaving <S%G863><s%> them, He again <S%G3825><s%> embarked <S%G1684><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side. <S%G4008><s%>

And they had forgotten <S%G1950><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> bread; <S%G740><s%> and did not have <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G1508><s%> than <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> loaf <S%G740><s%> in the boat <S%G4143><s%> with them.

And He was giving <S%G1291><s%> orders <S%G1291><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Watch <S%G3708><s%> out! Beware <S%G991><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of Herod. <S%G2264><s%>"
And they [began] to discuss <S%G1260><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> [the fact] that they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> aware <S%G1097><s%> of this, said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you discuss <S%G1260><s%> [the fact] that you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>? Do you not yet <S%G3768><s%> see <S%G3539><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%>? Do you have <S%G2192><s%> a hardened <S%G4456><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>?
"Having <S%G2192><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> do you not see <S%G991><s%>? And having <S%G2192><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> do you not hear <S%G191><s%>? And do you not remember, <S%G3421><s%>

when <S%G3753><s%> I broke <S%G2806><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> for the five <S%G4000><s%> thousand, <S%G4000><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces <S%G2801><s%> you picked <S%G142><s%> up?" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>"

"And when <S%G3753><s%> [I broke] the seven <S%G2033><s%> for the four <S%G5070><s%> thousand, <S%G5070><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> large <S%G4711><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full <S%G4138><s%> of broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces <S%G2801><s%> did you pick <S%G142><s%> up?" And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Seven. <S%G2033><s%>"
And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do you not yet <S%G3768><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%>?"
And they came <S%G2064><s%> to Bethsaida. <S%G966><s%> And they brought <S%G5342><s%> a blind <S%G5185><s%> man <S%G5185><s%> to Him, and entreated <S%G3870><s%> Him to touch <S%G681><s%> him.

And taking <S%G1949><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> man <S%G5185><s%> by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> He brought <S%G1627><s%> him out of the village; <S%G2968><s%> and after spitting <S%G4429><s%> on his eyes, <S%G3659><s%> and laying <S%G2007><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> upon him, He asked <S%G1905><s%> him, "Do you see <S%G991><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%>?"

And he looked <S%G308><s%> up and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I see <S%G991><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> for I am seeing <S%G3708><s%> [them] like <S%G5613><s%> trees, <S%G1186><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> about. <S%G4043><s%>"

Then <S%G1534><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> He laid <S%G2007><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> upon his eyes; <S%G3788><s%> and he looked <S%G1227><s%> intently <S%G1227><s%> and was restored, <S%G600><s%> and [began] to see <S%G1227><s%> everything <S%G537><s%> clearly. <S%G5081><s%>
And He sent <S%G649><s%> him to his home, <S%G3624><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Do not even <S%G3366><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> the village. <S%G2968><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, along <S%G2532><s%> with His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> to the villages <S%G2968><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi; <S%G5376><s%> and on the way <S%G3598><s%> He questioned <S%G1905><s%> His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Who <S%G5101><s%> do people <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%>?"

And they told <S%G3004><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> and others <S%G243><s%> [say] Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> but others, <S%G243><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>"

And He [continued] by questioning <S%G1905><s%> them, "But who <S%G5101><s%> do you say <S%G3004><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%>?" Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Thou art <S%G1510><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>"
And He warned <S%G2008><s%> them to tell <S%G3004><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Him.

And He began <S%G757><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> them that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> and be rejected <S%G593><s%> by the elders <S%G4245><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and be killed, <S%G615><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>
And He was stating <S%G2980><s%> the matter <S%G3056><s%> plainly. <S%G3954><s%> And Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> Him aside <S%G4355><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Him.

But turning <S%G1994><s%> around <S%G1994><s%> and seeing <S%G3708><s%> His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> He rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Get <S%G5217><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> Me, Satan; <S%G4567><s%> for you are not setting <S%G5426><s%> your mind <S%G5426><s%> on God's interests, but man's."

And He summoned <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> with His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Me, let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up his cross, <S%G4716><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> Me.

"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it; but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for My sake <S%G1752><s%> and the gospel's shall save <S%G4982><s%> it.
"For what <S%G5101><s%> does it profit <S%G5623><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> to gain <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and forfeit <S%G2210><s%> his soul <S%G5590><s%>?
"For what <S%G5101><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his soul <S%G5590><s%>?

"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of Me and My words <S%G3056><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> and sinful <S%G268><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will also <S%G2532><s%> be ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of him when <S%G3752><s%> He comes <S%G2064><s%> in the glory <S%G1391><s%> of His Father <S%G3962><s%> with the holy <S%G40><s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>"
